sentences.sentence: The value of Britain increase greatly with steady steps between 2010 and 2014, then it decrease greatly by 2015; while America decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2015.
The value of 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014 and 2015 in America is greatly lower Britain.

sentences.sentence: The value of Britain increase greatly with steady steps between 2010 and 2014, then it decrease greatly by 2015; while America decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2015.
The value of 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014 and 2015 in America is greatly lower Britain.
